title: Slave trade trend Carolinas and Georgia

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the trend in the number of enslaved Africans brought to the Carolinas and Georgia depicted in the graph?

choices.label: It sharply decreased before the 1770s and then returned to the level of 1751â€“1760.
It increased before the 1770s and then declined between 1771 and 1790.
It remained steady before 1770 and reached zero slave imports by 1771.
It consistently decreased until reaching zero slave imports by 1781.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
